name: ARCHIVED YouTube Rounded
description:
!! Youtube killed this style, so this is broken now and I am too lazy to fix it, so yeah. 

Make YouTube some more rounded

! Can contain some bugs on 1080p+ screens, please report all bugs here - https://vk.me/vertopolkalf or here - https://t.me/vertopolkalf
additional_info:
21.04.20 - v.1.0
- Partially remade video link to video cards
- Google Sans font from fonts.google.com for some headers
- Hover animations
- Light/Dark mode support

21.04.20 - v.1.1
- Fixed fullscreen video border-radius

02.05.20 - v.1.2
- Added header font dropdown
- Some graphical fixes

06.05.20 - v.1.3
- Stream live chat
- Remade card animations
- Minor fixes
- border-radius are smaller for sub and sponsor buttons

17.05.20 - v1.4
- Fixed some 1080p+ screen bugs
- Some Player improvments and fixes
--- Mini Player Fix
--- In-player popups rounded
- Playlist page improvments

01.09.20 - v.1.5
- Removed some animations

style_setting_options.label: Google Sans
